Through the introduction of basic music elements as well as the appreciation of the masterpieces of various composers, it is hoped that students will build up basic music knowledge about music and enhance professional music appreciation potentiality in music. The goals include: 1. Elevating students' capability in music appreciation 2. Inspiring students' interest in music with a view to improving our society into a harmonious world. 3. Introducing domestic and international famous composers' pieces 4. Touring of various forms of music: classical, ethnic, applied and popular music. Contents of this course include: 1.Introduction 2. Vocal music 3. Instrumental music 4. Ritual music 5. Dance music 6. Theatre music

description.zh: 以攝影來進行社會介入的創作作品，在當代藝術的領域中已經不再陌生，而這樣的發展也促成在社會學領域中越來越多關於攝影與社會的討論。本課程主要分為兩大部分，第一部分將從攝影史發展脈絡，來談攝影的社會使用，第二部分則是探討在當代藝術中，如何將攝影作為一種社會實踐的方式。除課堂講解和集體討論外，本課程也將透過實作討論同學的攝影計畫和作品，期使讓同學對於攝影，可以產生新的社會性思考，並開始進行影像與社會介入的嘗試。
description.en: In the field of contemporary art, photography has been developing into a way of social intervention. This trend also contributes to triggering more dialogues concerning “photography and society” in the discipline of sociology. The course mainly includes two parts: photography history and the photography as a social practice. In the first section, along with the history of photography, the social usages of photography will be introduced. In the second section, how photography art can be a social practice and what kinds of practice have been explored will be . In addition to class lectures and group discussions, the course requires all students to complete their individual photo project in the end of semester and their works will be presented in class.

description.zh:
本課程講授媒體、企業與政治三者之間競合的互動關係，教你看透媒體新聞背後的意識形態、商業利益與政治操作。深入瞭解由傳統紙媒到當代電子媒體、網路媒體、各種新媒體通路中，大數據與內容的製作該如何結合運用。新聞媒體在企業與政治體系中的特殊角色與效應也是探討焦點。課程中將會針對海峽兩岸新聞媒體與綜藝節目製作做對比分析。
    本課程結合理論與實務導向的專題，以培養學生對當代傳播媒體現象與體制深入分析探究的能力;更引導學生具體認識在數位新媒體的時代中，如何利用新媒體來進行廣告、行銷、公關等實務操作的策略及步驟。
description.en:
This course focuses on the interactive relationship between media, business, and politics, thereby helping students understand the political ideology, business interests, and political manipulation behind news and media events. The course also presents an in-depth analysis of the combination of big data and media content, in the complex production network of paper media, electronic media, internet media, and various other new media. The role and effects of news media in contemporary business and political establishments will also be explored. The course brings in a comparative and critical analysis of news and entertainment programming in both Taiwan and mainland China. 
This course combines theoretical framework and professional practice in order to cultivate the ability to intelligently analyze and explore the dynamics of various media phenomena and media institutions. The students will also be expected to learn the basic concepts of practical strategies and operating skills of new

description.zh: 婚姻是一般人所必經的過程，家庭是生活的場所，關係著人生的幸福與美滿。本課程強調美滿婚姻與幸福家庭是一門學問，因此，課程內容包括：對婚姻與家庭有正確的認知、積極的態度、完整的規劃，並培養有認真努力去實踐的方法與能力。如何追求真正的快樂與幸福？除了在婚姻與家庭中追求平等化、合理化、自由化、公平化外，自我成長、相互尊重都是本課程的學習目標，以協助學生思考婚姻與家庭的終生大事。
description.en: Marriage is a process that most people will go through.  Family is where you belong to, and where the satisfaction and happiness come from. We believe that it is a kind of scholarship to have a high-quality marriage and a wonderful family.  The contents of this course include having the correct understanding of marriage and family, cultivating positive attitude, developing complete plans, and realizing them with all efforts. This course will help students think totally about marriage and family, learn to pursue equality, reasonableness and liberty, keep growing and respect each other, so that we can obtain the real delight and happiness.

description.zh: 教學目標：針對當前社會中之政治、經濟、社會、文化等各層面所形成之重大問題與現象加以探討，予以概略整合性之介紹，以使學生對社會現況更加瞭解並進而關懷所生活之環境。開課基礎：以原開設之社會科學概論為基礎，而向實務面擴充之課程。教學內容：採單元教學、口授、作業、探討意見交換並行方式進行。1.真正的民意－政治生態與國會。2.尖銳的對立－政黨競爭。3.台灣經驗－經濟奇蹟。4.高齡化的社會－銀髮族與人生。5.應關懷的族群－社福。6.立國的基礎－教育改革。7.慾望街車－犯罪與司法。8.和平發展之關鍵－兩岸關係。9.其他。
description.en:
Teaching goal: Analyze the significant problems and phenomena concerning politics, economy, society and culture, and give a brief account of such phenomena with a view to facilitating students' understanding of the status quo and encouraging students to devote care to their living environment. Pre-course requirement: A basic grasp of "the Introduction of Social Science" is required for more advanced and expanded discussions in this course are based on it. 
Teaching activities: Lecturing, assignments, and discussions. Teaching units: Political patterns and parliament, Competition of Parties, Taiwan Economical Miracle, Elders and Their Life, Welfare for Minorities, Education Reformation, Crime and Justice, Cross-affair Relations, Others.

description.zh: 為了讓學生有機會學習有系統的瞭解、接納自己，體諒父母、尊長，關愛別人，回饋社會，進而發揮潛能，自主自在的過一生，乃設計此種10～15人的獨特小團體，運用團體動力，以「交流分析」(Transactional Analysis,TA)為主要理論架構，採理論與實務、個別與團體並重方式，在師生積極參與中，討論、分享、成長。課程內容主要包含交流分析概述，人格結構與功能分析，自我圖，關愛經濟，愛的證言，交流方式分析，時間結構分析，心理遊戲分析，心理劇本分析的理論與習作等。
description.en: In a systematic way, this course will help students understand themselves, accept themselves, and understand their parents and elders.  Also, it teaches students how to care for other people and have contributions to society with a view to promoting students' potential and live their life self-confiently and freely.  The class is to be desinged into groups composed of 10 to 15 students in each section in order to make use of group interactions, to encourage students to actively participate in class discussion and experience sharing.  On the basis of Transactional Analysis(TA), both theory and practice, individual and group activities are emphasized.  Through such a focus, students will go through various stages leading to personal growth.  The contents of this course include: an introduction to TA, an analysis on personality, self-realization, caring and love experiences, transactional analysis, psychological tests, and game analysis, theory and exercise on psychological plays.

description.zh: 介紹日常生活中所經常遭遇到的案例使學生認識法律上之常識，培養學生珍惜法律上所賦予之權利，並及時行使庶免讓權利睡著了，致蒙受意外損害。並督促學生善盡法律上之責任，蔚為人人知法，人人守法的風尚，導致社會祥和。授課內容：按民法總則、債篇、物權、親屬、繼承各篇之順序，選擇與日常生活關係最密切之案例，逐一介紹，並對解決之道詳加說明。有觸及民間權益者，例如民間互助會，使用票據之常識，海峽兩岸婚姻，汽車肇事與保險責任及軍人及其家屬優待條例等均一併介紹。
description.en: This course-through carefully examining individual cases that often happen-helps understand more about legal knowledge so that they would cherish their endowed rights and protect themselves from being hurt. This course also encourages the students to serve the duty of laws in the hope that "All People Know The Laws and All People Follow The Laws." Thecontents: Introduction to General Principles, Provisions of Obligations, Family and Succession. Cases that have much to do with the daily life are picked up for discussion. Other topics like the mutual self-help funds, the use of checks, cross-strait marriages, vehicle accidents, insurance, bonus regulations on the military servicemen and their family are also included.

description.zh: 在本課程中，同學將學習到計算機程式語言Python基礎與應用，建立Python程式設計的基本概念。透過做中學、學中做，建構程式設計的基礎，以及基本程式運算邏輯，以培養運算思維、動手做的能力。期末以分組方式完成一個與學生專業領域相關應用的專題，學習如何運用程式解決與自身相關領域運用上的問題。
description.en: In this course, students will learn the basics and applications of the Python programming language and establish the basic concepts of Python programming design. Through the continuous practice, student will construct the basic logic of the program design, and the ability of computation think and practice application. At the final, a topic related to the application of students' professional subjects will be completed in groups, and student will learn how to use the program to solve problems in the relevant fields.

description.zh: 藥膳在中醫理論指導下，將中草藥與實務相配合，運用傳統烹調技術和現代加工方法製成味、色、形俱佳的、更有保健和治療作用作之食品，其內容廣泛，迄今已有三千年之歷史。所謂藥食同源更是集中而深刻的體現了藥膳之重要性。本課程共分：湯膳概論、穀物湯膳、蔬菜湯膳、果品湯膳、畜肉湯膳、海鮮湯膳、藥草湯膳和美容養生湯膳等。
description.en: The Applied Nutrition of Life is two credit hours course and design especially for technology students. This curriculum emphasizes on the clinical applications and action mechanisms of various food cooking of Chinese drugs. The curriculum trends will start from more details and bring a completely concepts. The subjects include some Chinese food cooking contain Chinese herbal and some skill to how to select a good quality Chinese herbal.

description.zh: CAD套裝軟體介紹、CAD數值技巧、二維畫圖、三維畫圖、曲面模型、實體模型建立、動畫之製作、最佳化設計、整合性之CAD系統及專題。
description.en: Introduction of CAD software package. Review of Numerical technique for CAD.2-D Graphics, 3-D Graphics, surface modeling, solid modeling. Design optimization, Integrated CAD systems and Animation project.

notes: *機械三甲乙丙合開,劉建緯老師,綜科328-1

description.zh: 本課程的目的在於培養學生書寫各式專業書信書寫 (如簡歷、提案、會議紀錄等) 的能力，並提供各種共同合作的機會，訓練學生在未來工作上所需之團隊配合能力。搭配本課程充分的練習，學生將能夠準確且有效地運用所學之專業書信形式來達成職場上的溝通需求。
description.en: This course aims to develop students' skills in performing selected types of professional written discourse (e.g., resumes, proposals, meeting minutes). Various opportunities for students to collaborate with their classmates will also be provided as they will often be required to do so in an actual workplace. With sufficient practice, students will finish this class with the ability to communicate clearly and effectively in written forms.

class.name: 專業職場英文銜接計畫

description.zh: 本課程以聽力訓練為基礎，藉由對不同情境對話培養英文聽力，亦盼讓學生增加字彙量。透過持續的練習和多樣性的活動—像是小組討論，影片和角色扮演，讓學生進一步了解如何掌握聽力技巧。
description.en: This course aims to help students develop their listening skills in different situations. This is a listening-based course, and through listening to different dialogues, students will be expected to improve vocabulary as well. With consistent practice and multiple activities—small-group/pair discussion, video-watching and role-playing, students will have a better understanding of how to use listening skills.

class.name: 專業職場英文銜接計畫

name.zh: 學院指定向度-人文與藝術
name.en: College designated dimension curriculum：Humanities and Art

description.zh:
各學院指定向度學分規定如下：
機電學院：人文與藝術向度課程4學分、社會與法治向度課程4學分、創新與創業向度課程4學分。
電資學院：人文與藝術向度課程4學分、自然與科學向度課程4學分、創新與創業向度課程4學分。
工程學院：人文與藝術向度課程4學分、社會與法治向度課程4學分、創新與創業向度課程4學分。
管理學院：人文與藝術向度課程4學分、社會與法治向度課程4學分、自然與科學向度課程4學分。
設計學院：人文與藝術向度課程4學分、社會與法治向度課程4學分、創新與創業向度課程4學分。
description.en:
The dimension credits stipulated by each college are as follows：
CMEE：4 credits for the humanities and art curriculum, 4 credits for the Social and Rules of Law curriculum, and 4 credits for the innovation and entrepreneurship curriculum.
EECS：4 credits for the humanities and art curriculum, 4 credits for the nature and science curriculum, and 4 credits for the innovation and entrepreneurship curriculum.
College of Engineering：4 credits for the humanities and art curriculum, 4 credits for the Social and Rules of Law curriculum, and 4 credits for the innovation and entrepreneurship curriculum.
College of Management：4 credits for the humanities and art curriculum, 4 credits for the Social and Rules of Law curriculum, and 4 credits for the nature and science curriculum.
College of Design： 4 credits for the humanities and art curriculum, 4 credits for the Social and Rules of Law curriculum, and 4 credits for the innovation and entrepreneurship curriculum.
CHASS：4 credits for t

notes: 請選：通識中心/博雅課程(二)

name.zh: 企業智能化營運實務與應用
name.en: Enterprise Information and Intelligent Enterprise Applications

description.zh: 採混成教學，透過面授了解企業，從產業、行業到組織，及資訊系統應用實務。藉由數位課程學習企業內各職能作業流程及ERP系統功能。配合上機實作及老師案例引導，強化系統運用與企業流程整合。
description.en: By mixed teaching methods, help students to learn enterprises from their industries, organizations and information system applications; Use digital learning courses to introduce tasks of roles in business and ERP system functions. Besides, online practices will be provided. With case studies guided by our instructors, students might learn how to integrate the system with actual enterprise operating procedures.

notes: *與大四研究所合開，產業接軌課程

description.zh: 以視覺藝術為探討重點，研究藝術起源以及原始美術、民俗與大眾藝術分野。探究式覺元素和設計原理以及應用媒材、使用技巧，涵蓋素描、水彩、油畫、版畫、混合媒材、雕塑、建築，廣告、包裝、服裝設計、工業產品設計及攝影等。配合幻燈教學，使同學對於視覺藝術有整體性、概括性的認識，以奠定將來從事藝術鑑賞和研究創造之基礎。
description.en: The focus of this course is the exploration of visual arts.  Students will study the origin of art and the distinction among primitive art, folk and popular art. This course also provides students with visual elements, design principles, applied media material, and techniques including charcoal drawing, water-colored painting, oil painting, graphic art, compound material, sculpture, architecture, advertisement, packaging, fashion design, industrial design, and photography. Slide teaching is adopted to give students a comprehensive and general understanding on visual art in order to foster students to appreciate, study, and create art.

description.zh: 人類從尚未有文字的歷史以來，就有各種不同規模的戰爭，戰爭很吊詭的以你死或我亡，相互毀滅之態勢，爭奪「活著」的條件。古今中外，爆發戰爭的因素或為爭奪領土、權位、或為族群之戰、為意識形態之戰、或為物質資源之爭奪。在視覺影像發達的今日社會，有關戰爭的歷史影像的紀錄片與劇情片數量龐大、並有許多可觀之處。本課程將利用這些描寫戰爭影像資料，帶領同學瞭解相關戰爭與戰役爆發的歷史及其經過。
description.en: Throughout human history, even prior to written record, various types of warfare and scales of battles have existed for various purposes of domination or survival by all means of cruelty and destruction. The arousal of violent conflicts might be an attempt at fighting for territorial dominion or material resources economically or altering another species ideologically. In today's modern societies, bountiful documentaries and films concerning historical warfare have been accumulated. This course will aim at giving students a broad understanding and profound knowledge of the causes, process, and effects of significant warfare in human history with the aid of visual images in different media.

notes: 人文與藝術向度,90人教室

description.zh: 音樂概論以透過此課程讓學生對音樂有總體認識，了解音樂的元素、技術理論及文化背景，同時在探索音樂美感構成上的標準，我們可以從探索不同歷史時期的人文思想背景，了解對於當時音樂創作理念與風格發展的影響，以及音樂審美觀念的發展演變之影響，立基於探索音樂的發展方向、藝術本質及審美意涵，對音樂藝術概念及美學思想之延伸探討。
description.en: Through this course—Introduction to Music, students would have a general understanding of music, understand the elements of music, technical theory and cultural background, at the same time in the music aesthetic to explore the composition of the standard, through exploring the different historical periods of humanistic background, to understand for the time that the idea of music composing and the impact of musical style development, as well as the development of music aesthetic concept of the evolution of the impact, based on discussing the development of music, the essence of art, and aesthetic meaning, to develop the concept of musical art, as well as a probe into the extension of aesthetic thought.

description.zh: 「生活美學」是現代人依據東西方文化及各方美學的定義所推論出來的名詞，指應用於「生活」中食、衣、住、行、育、樂所體現美的內容及活動。依循相異的生活型態、社會環境，人類試圖重構生活藝術化與藝術生活化的當代美學。
description.en: “Aesthetics of living " will address the East-West cultural and aesthetic experience through series of questions that drive the discourse in contemporary life’s content and activities. Following the different lifestyles, social environment, human tries to reconstruct everyday life into contemporary aesthetics of living. This course aims to encourage students to think what is aesthetic of living, through the real life and spiritual life and concerned itself with the aesthetic problems in the lives of others.

description.zh: 本課程是為非專業學生所設計的哲學概論，介紹西洋哲學的起源、西洋哲學的問題，以及哲學與人生的關係。哲學的問題意識起自人類的自覺，人類意圖認識自己，為宇宙人生尋求解答，哲學的發生本自人類天賦的求知欲，即其本性中對於智慧的追求與愛慕。這種愛慕智慧的精神是希臘文明留給西方世界的遺產，對於知識能持客觀批判的精神，對於真理能存認真熱切的態度，對於人生能有超克苦難的修持。在國際化的世代，我們對西方的認識應更深入其精神層面，此乃本課程規劃的初衷。
description.en: This course is designed for student who is not disciplined in philosophy. As an introduction, we begin at the origin of western philosophy, the philosophical questions and finally, the relationship of human life and philosophy. Philosophy takes place when human being thinking of himself. Man by nature desire to know himself as well as the external world. And due to this love of wisdom, men can be critical to knowledge and be passionate toward truth. Eventually, grasping the sprit of western philosophy , we can view our life in quite a different view. In our time, facing the world of international, we should better understand the western culture, which is rooted in philosophy.

description.zh:
經濟學重視邏輯與嚴謹推理的理性特質是其主要特色，此亦為理工科系人之專長優勢，然而僅偏重左腦訓練的人才往往讓人覺得生冷機械，對事物看法也常過於直接而缺乏人情，若能在不失理性效率之下，兼顧以人為本之社會人文感性關懷，則經濟學自無愧為社會科學之母，其訓練目標亦與通識教育的人格均衡發展目的一致！
為避免陷入一般經濟教學因理論工具比重過高而失焦，導致學生學習興趣驟減以致成效不彰，本課程重點在於先讓學生擁有強烈之學習動機，接著認知到"確立學習目的"的重要性，藉由生活實例直接帶領學生面對並感受問題，從而引導出經濟學切入問題的思維方式，並傳授其正確可行的學習態度與方法，同時提醒學生維持對專業知識批判的精神，在嚴謹訓練架構下督促其尋求感性的意涵，因而不致陷入經濟工具與名詞的浩瀚泥沼中，從而漸進體會出經濟學之精髓。
description.en:
The science of economics is characterized by logics and cautious reasoning-at which most of the students of natural science and technology are good at. It is also a fact that those who take better advantage of the right brain are very likely to be straightforward and thus seemingly more mechanical and unsympathetic. Economics can be seen as the mother of science under the condition that rational efficiency-as well as the socially humanity--are kept at the same time. As a matter of act, the economic trainings share the same goal as what is required by the General Education courses.
The first priority of the course is to highly motivate the students in the economic issues. We do our best to avoid too much weight generally put into teaching economics, leading to poor learning and teaching experience. Cases are studied in such a way that students will recognize the "real purpose of studying."  Real cases and examples are brought into discussion. We guide the students to"feel"the problems.

description.zh: 此門課程主要在於瞭解社會學的意涵，並藉由跨領域的學習，讓不同學科能有對話的空間。課程涵蓋的範圍會兼顧理論與實用性，讓學生能思考當今的社會，理解到產生因素的多元性，並進而使個人眼界能更加開拓。期望學生於課程學習中能夠擁有更多對於整個社會的不同思維，以強化本身學科之所需，不但具有理論性深入的洞察力，也能引用到管理上實質的層面。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to understand sociology. It covers theory and practicability, and make students consider the current society, and understand the generated factors of diversity . Expect students' study can have more for the community as a whole different way of thinking, in order to strengthen their academic needs, not only has the theoretical depth of insight, but also on the substance applied to the management level.

description.zh: 新經濟與舊經濟的分野不是在有『e』還是沒有『e』，而是在有『i』還是沒有『i』，而『i』就是『Innovation，創新』。二十一世紀的『腦力經濟』最重要的戲規則就是『智慧財產權』，同時也是WTO會員國必須遵守的重要規範之一。課程內容主要包括三個最基本的智慧財產權課題：專利權，商標權，以及著作權；而為配合本校學生學科背景，本課程將較著重於『專利』方面的實務知識，並且講授『如何激發創意，以培養學生日後能好好應用『智慧財產權』的保護。
description.en: The difference between New-economy and Old-economy is not caused by having "e" or not having "e", but caused by owining "i" or not owning "i". where "I" means "Innovation:.  Intellectual Property is not only the most importance business rule of the :Brain economy era:, but also one of the most important agreements among WTO members.  This course includes the basic three subjects of Intellectual Property:Patent, Trademark, and Copyright.  In order to accommodate the learning background for most of NTUT students, the contents of this course will focus more on the practical practice of the Patennt.  In addition, it also includes the subject of "how to activate your creativeness:so as to make students can use what they learn, "Intellectual Property:, to protect their intellectual work.

description.zh: 生態與環境保護是廿世紀的新課題，也是人類目前及未來所面臨的最大考驗。因為環境問題是超越國界的，因此環境的保護是每個人都必須瞭解的，也是每個人應盡的責任。本課程首先在了解生態環境與生活素質的關係，並了解環境污染問題的產生及其分類，再就台灣環境問題之所在分析其根源，最後了解台灣環境實施之現況後，並共同研究解決之道。
description.en: Introduction to Ecology and Environmental Protection is a brand new issue of the 20th century; also, it is the biggest challenge of all human beings and our offspring. Because environmental protection is an international issue, everyone got to realize its importance and take some action. This lesson is designed to help students understand the connection between our ecological environment and our living condition, the environmental pollution problems and their classification, the environmental problems in Taiwan, and the solution to Taiwan's environmental problems after the situation introduction.

description.zh: 生命科學概論，重心放在人體生命科學，並強化醫學的角色。此外，中西醫結合的觀點，詮釋抗老、防癌。以身心靈養生的方式，強化預防醫學。並從人類疾病的本源性病因，根本探討。當然，如何增強免疫力，袪除自由基是主軸。在探究人體潛能、身心靈養生或疾病的本源性原因時，都必須重視「經絡」系統。總之生命是非常奧妙的，不僅只物質面，更要重視心靈層面，中西醫整合方向，必是廿一世紀的主流。
description.en: This course focuses on human life science and emphasizes the roles of medicine on improving the life quality of human beings. It also uses the point of view of integration traditional Chinese and western medicine to interpret how to prevent the aging of body and occurrence of cancers. This course also focuses on how to keep the body, mind and spirit in the best conditon in order to prevent the occurrence of human diseases. In addition, it deeply discusses the eseential etiology of human disease and teaches audiences how to enhance the body immunity and how to get rid of free radicals. The importance of meridian system of the human body and its relationships to human potentiality, body, mind spirit and diseses are also discussed. Life is marvelous. The completeness of life depends on the saisfaction of not only the material but also menetal and spiritual needs. Integration of the traditional Chinese and western medicine to improve the life quality of human beings is the main issue.

description.zh: 本課程旨在培養學生成為具有深度文化視覺的科技人。從認識本土文化為起點，進而認識世界文化。引導學生如何探究文化現象，並且深入文化的精神境界，物質境界，瞭解文化價值與文化傳統，讓文化觀點充分融入個人的思維內涵。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to develop the cultural cultivation of our technology majored students. Starting with the culture of our own land and extending to world-wide culture. The teachers would guide the students to explore the phenomena of the culture, and try to find out both the spirit and the material of the culture. Through the understanding of the worth and the tradition of the culture, the students might merge the cultural cultivation into their personal thinking.

description.zh:
新創事業面臨許多的挑戰，包括：避�УP大企業競爭，找到存活的依據、從無到創立強勢品牌、創立或擴張自有市場/消費者據點等。本課程旨在啟發修課同學創業的興趣並協助修課同學思考新創事業如何平衡有限資源以迎向挑戰。
新創企業已發展成熟的企業是不一樣，主要是因為新創事業的資源有限，創業家必須同時兼顧許多面向並回應顧客所需。本課程旨在協助修課同學思考創建企業應注意的各種面向評估自己的創能力。
課程包含了三大部份，第一部份為創新與創業概念啟發；第二部份在辨別市場機會與發展市場；最後第三部份為新創事業行銷管理。行銷活動能夠將企業的產品及服務傳遞給顧客；並將產品、服務及企業本身的資訊帶到市場上；將顧客資訊回饋給企業。創業行銷管理能夠幫助創業者向潛在投資者及企業夥伴銷售創意以獲得資源，也讓創業家透過創新的商業手法來充分利用稀少的資源。
description.en:
Managers must have excellent leadership skills in order to A start-up company has lots of challenges, such as: niche market located and brand diffusion. The course intends to encourage the participant to become an entrepreneur and handle with these challenges. A start-up company is different from well-developed one due to limited resources. Usually, to response customer’s requirement, the entrepreneur must take multiple criteria into consideration simultaneously.
    The course includes three parts. Part I build students’ concept about innovation and entrepreneurship. Part II is about market identification. Part III is about marketing management of a start-up company. The efficient marketing activities enable business to approach customer’s requirement, to bring their customer product (or services) and get customer’s feedback. Also, the marketing management helps entrepreneur to reach their potential investor to obtain more resources.

notes: 創新與創業向度,90人教室

description.zh: 透過一系列的資料採集、參考與互動，包含經驗分享、影片欣賞等，帶領修課同學探索創新（Innovation）、創業（Startup）以及最重要的 – 創業家創新精神（Entrepreneur Innovative Thinking）之本質。無論是工作上的創造，學習上的創造，或者是(創)事業上的創造，都必然需要一定程度的創新，才能在全球化競爭以及指數型科技（Exponential Technology）發展的趨勢下存活，最終獲得勝利、創造價值。
description.en: Through series of classes to train students embracing the innovative thinking and gradually internalize it to become innovative entrepreneurship. Since the generation is changing so rapidly, the competitors are no longer came from local land but from everywhere in global village. Under this highly competitive world, every one of us need to fully embrace the true value of innovation, and incubate our own entrepreneurship with hack spirit, which will lead us to an island of innovation.

notes: 創新與創業向度,90人教室

name.en: Start to APP Design and Application

description.zh:
學習相似於Microsoft Power Point 的「拖-拉-點-選」操作方式，再加上一小部份的 Low Code程式編碼，即可以設計與製作出:「專業級的 APP」 !
本課程運用學校內的雲端平台: AgilePoint NX，改變了以往撰寫APP 的模式，不再需要撰寫複雜的程式碼，讓學生專注於 APP的邏輯流程與UI(使用者介面)，進而發展貼近市場裡的商業模式，設計出精彩的APP!
課程的教學，採用傳統臺北工專的黑手工程師訓練模式:
「由經入史」:先講解理論架構，進而延伸到產業的實務運用。
嚴格要求上課同學動手實做，達成每週的設定目標。課堂上講師所示範的範例非常豐富，下課後會有一定份量的Homework(實作型作業)。
經此系統化訓練，在APP的設計與製作上，將擁有踏實的內涵與技術，增強在校學生，未來在職場上的競爭力。
「讓不懂IT(資訊工程)、非理工背景的學生，更能設計出高人氣的APP! 」
description.en:
Learn the "Click and Drag" operation method, as like Microsoft Power Point, and adds some Low-Code, you can design and create: "Professional APP"!
This course uses the cloud platform in the school: AgilePoint NX, which changes the mode of writing APP in the past, no longer needs to write complex code, let students focus on the logic flow of the APP and UI (user interface), and then close to the market requirement. 
This course uses the Taipei Tech Practical-Engineer training method:
"From Theory to Practical": First explain the theoretical structure, and then extend to the practical application of the industry.
Strictly ask the trainees to do it, and achieve the weekly set goals. The examples demonstrated by the lecturers in the class are very rich, and there will be a certain amount of Homework after the class.
Through this systematic training, in the design and production of APP, we will have practical connotation and technology to enhance the competitiveness of students in coll

description.zh: 透過一系列的資料採集、參考與互動，包含經驗分享、影片欣賞等，帶領修課同學探索創新（Innovation）、創業（Startup）以及最重要的 – 創業家創新精神（Entrepreneur Innovative Thinking）之本質。無論是工作上的創造，學習上的創造，或者是(創)事業上的創造，都必然需要一定程度的創新，才能在全球化競爭以及指數型科技（Exponential Technology）發展的趨勢下存活，最終獲得勝利、創造價值。
description.en: Through series of classes to train students embracing the innovative thinking and gradually internalize it to become innovative entrepreneurship. Since the generation is changing so rapidly, the competitors are no longer came from local land but from everywhere in global village. Under this highly competitive world, every one of us need to fully embrace the true value of innovation, and incubate our own entrepreneurship with hack spirit, which will lead us to an island of innovation.

notes: 創新與創業向度,90人教室

description.zh:
新創事業面臨許多的挑戰，包括：避�УP大企業競爭，找到存活的依據、從無到創立強勢品牌、創立或擴張自有市場/消費者據點等。本課程旨在啟發修課同學創業的興趣並協助修課同學思考新創事業如何平衡有限資源以迎向挑戰。
新創企業已發展成熟的企業是不一樣，主要是因為新創事業的資源有限，創業家必須同時兼顧許多面向並回應顧客所需。本課程旨在協助修課同學思考創建企業應注意的各種面向評估自己的創能力。
課程包含了三大部份，第一部份為創新與創業概念啟發；第二部份在辨別市場機會與發展市場；最後第三部份為新創事業行銷管理。行銷活動能夠將企業的產品及服務傳遞給顧客；並將產品、服務及企業本身的資訊帶到市場上；將顧客資訊回饋給企業。創業行銷管理能夠幫助創業者向潛在投資者及企業夥伴銷售創意以獲得資源，也讓創業家透過創新的商業手法來充分利用稀少的資源。
description.en:
Managers must have excellent leadership skills in order to A start-up company has lots of challenges, such as: niche market located and brand diffusion. The course intends to encourage the participant to become an entrepreneur and handle with these challenges. A start-up company is different from well-developed one due to limited resources. Usually, to response customer’s requirement, the entrepreneur must take multiple criteria into consideration simultaneously.
    The course includes three parts. Part I build students’ concept about innovation and entrepreneurship. Part II is about market identification. Part III is about marketing management of a start-up company. The efficient marketing activities enable business to approach customer’s requirement, to bring their customer product (or services) and get customer’s feedback. Also, the marketing management helps entrepreneur to reach their potential investor to obtain more resources.

description.zh:
透過分析創新成功之實際個案，讓修課同學了解創新的本質。課程中將介紹不同類型的創新個案，包括：技術創新、產品創新、服務創新與管理創新。本課程也擬搭配邀請成功之創業顧問與談，提供實務經驗，分享創業者該有的認知以及創業的重要理念，當然也包括分享他們在邀創業過程中所面臨的各類挑戰。
創業是每個人都曾經懷抱過的夢想，透過創新成功之個案的分析，可以了解到個案公司是如何有步驟的循序漸進。針對每個個案，我們要求每位同學於課前完成個案的閱讀，並於上課前交出本次課程的課前預習心得。我們希望每位參與的同學都能在討論時充分表達意見，遇有不清楚或不同意見時能夠勇於提出他們的看法。本課程擬營造出一種研究的環境，讓學生可以針對個案盡其所能清楚的提出建議並來說服同儕。
description.en:
The course enable participant to realize the essential features of innovation via cases study. Various types of innovation cases are included, such as: technology innovation, service innovation and management innovation. We also plan to invites some successful constants to give participants talk and share their experiences, including the challenge and their resolving process.
The real case study enables participants to understand the entrepreneurship and the steps to start a business. The participants are required to complete the case reading and a preview report is required in advance the class. We hope that every participant can propose their opinion and persuade others colleges of their viewpoints.

description.zh: 創業與財務概論課程的主要目的是要使學生了解如何在企業創立的時候，透過財務技術，來評估企業的經營績效與價值。本課程將介紹以下內容：(1) 公司創業的財務報表與科目報導與分析 (2) 基本創業財務分析理論 (3) 公司的償債能力、獲利能力、經營能力、資本結構、現金流量的分析 (4) 特殊行業的財務報表分析 (5) 探討我國最近發佈的會計準則公報對企業與投資人的影響。
description.en: The goal of the introduction to entrepreneurship and finance course is to help students, when the company is in the stage of entrepreneurship, evaluate the performance and measure the values of firms by financial statements. The topics of this course includes (1) entrepreneurship financial reports and analysis; (2) basic entrepreneurship financial statement analysis; 3) solvency, profitability, business performance, financial structure and cash flow analysis; 4) financial statement analysis of special industries 5) recent developments of GAAP.

description.zh: 藥膳在中醫理論指導下，將中草藥與實務相配合，運用傳統烹調技術和現代加工方法製成味、色、形俱佳的、更有保健和治療作用作之食品，其內容廣泛，迄今已有三千年之歷史。所謂藥食同源更是集中而深刻的體現了藥膳之重要性。本課程共分：湯膳概論、穀物湯膳、蔬菜湯膳、果品湯膳、畜肉湯膳、海鮮湯膳、藥草湯膳和美容養生湯膳等。
description.en: The Applied Nutrition of Life is two credit hours course and design especially for technology students. This curriculum emphasizes on the clinical applications and action mechanisms of various food cooking of Chinese drugs. The curriculum trends will start from more details and bring a completely concepts. The subjects include some Chinese food cooking contain Chinese herbal and some skill to how to select a good quality Chinese herbal.

description.zh: 生命科學概論，重心放在人體生命科學，並強化醫學的角色。此外，中西醫結合的觀點，詮釋抗老、防癌。以身心靈養生的方式，強化預防醫學。並從人類疾病的本源性病因，根本探討。當然，如何增強免疫力，袪除自由基是主軸。在探究人體潛能、身心靈養生或疾病的本源性原因時，都必須重視「經絡」系統。總之生命是非常奧妙的，不僅只物質面，更要重視心靈層面，中西醫整合方向，必是廿一世紀的主流。
description.en: This course focuses on human life science and emphasizes the roles of medicine on improving the life quality of human beings. It also uses the point of view of integration traditional Chinese and western medicine to interpret how to prevent the aging of body and occurrence of cancers. This course also focuses on how to keep the body, mind and spirit in the best conditon in order to prevent the occurrence of human diseases. In addition, it deeply discusses the eseential etiology of human disease and teaches audiences how to enhance the body immunity and how to get rid of free radicals. The importance of meridian system of the human body and its relationships to human potentiality, body, mind spirit and diseses are also discussed. Life is marvelous. The completeness of life depends on the saisfaction of not only the material but also menetal and spiritual needs. Integration of the traditional Chinese and western medicine to improve the life quality of human beings is the main issue.

description.zh: 學習邏輯推理主要的目的便是幫助我們培養一種邏輯能力，使我們能夠為我們的人生做出正確的判斷。本課程包括:邏輯的基本觀念，真值表推論法，語句邏輯中自然演繹法的18條基本推論規則，語句邏輯的基本公理系統，量化邏輯中自然演繹法的基本規論推測，量化邏輯的詮釋方法，量化邏輯的基本公理系統，語句邏輯的後設理論，量化邏輯的後設理論，傳統的三段論法，謬誤理論、與介於自然與形式語言之間的翻譯等等。
description.en: The main purpose of studying "Logical Inference" is to help us obtain a kind of logical ability, by means of which we will be able to make right choices for our life. This courses covers at least the following topics: basic ideas in logic, the truth table method, 18 basic rules of inference in the method of natural deduction in sentential logic, basic axiomatic systems in sentential logic, basic rules of inference in the method of natural deduction in quantificational logic, interpretations in quantificational logic, basic axiomatic systems in quantificational logic, meta-theorem in sentential logic, meta-theorem in quantificational logic, traditional syllogism, the fallacy theory, and the translation between natural and formal language, etc.

notes: 自然與科學向度,1樓教室

description.zh: 「生活美學」是現代人依據東西方文化及各方美學的定義所推論出來的名詞，指應用於「生活」中食、衣、住、行、育、樂所體現美的內容及活動。依循相異的生活型態、社會環境，人類試圖重構生活藝術化與藝術生活化的當代美學。
description.en: “Aesthetics of living " will address the East-West cultural and aesthetic experience through series of questions that drive the discourse in contemporary life’s content and activities. Following the different lifestyles, social environment, human tries to reconstruct everyday life into contemporary aesthetics of living. This course aims to encourage students to think what is aesthetic of living, through the real life and spiritual life and concerned itself with the aesthetic problems in the lives of others.

name.en: Analysis of the Historic Persons in Modern China

description.zh: 自國父鼓吹革命，以迄民國肇造，多少英雄豪傑活躍於歷史舞台上。對於這些時代人物的臧否、評價，實有進一步認識和了解的必要，以便在閱讀此段歷史之時，能作出正確而客觀的判斷。是以本課程擬就民國時期中，較具有關鍵且影響力較大的人物作一公正持平的介紹。此外，台灣在日據時期，亦有多位民主鬥士，不畏異族的高壓統治，竭盡所能，鼓吹新思想、倡導民主運動，其精神實在可佩，對於這些人物我們不可不知，自然亦在我們所要講授的範圍之內。
description.en: Since the revolution of Dr. Sun Yat-sen, many people have played important roles in Chinese history. They have had much influences in our country. It is essential for our students to have further knowledge about them, especiallt during the period of Japanese occupation in Taiwan. There were many people who didn't yield to Japanese control and promoted the democratic movement in Taiwan. They loved the land and tried their best to advocate new thought.In the course, we'll make detailed and accurate introductions about them. Fair understanding will make the students have objective comments about historic persons and the history of the period.

description.zh: 新經濟與舊經濟的分野不是在有『e』還是沒有『e』，而是在有『i』還是沒有『i』，而『i』就是『Innovation，創新』。二十一世紀的『腦力經濟』最重要的戲規則就是『智慧財產權』，同時也是WTO會員國必須遵守的重要規範之一。課程內容主要包括三個最基本的智慧財產權課題：專利權，商標權，以及著作權；而為配合本校學生學科背景，本課程將較著重於『專利』方面的實務知識，並且講授『如何激發創意，以培養學生日後能好好應用『智慧財產權』的保護。
description.en: The difference between New-economy and Old-economy is not caused by having "e" or not having "e", but caused by owining "i" or not owning "i". where "I" means "Innovation:.  Intellectual Property is not only the most importance business rule of the :Brain economy era:, but also one of the most important agreements among WTO members.  This course includes the basic three subjects of Intellectual Property:Patent, Trademark, and Copyright.  In order to accommodate the learning background for most of NTUT students, the contents of this course will focus more on the practical practice of the Patennt.  In addition, it also includes the subject of "how to activate your creativeness:so as to make students can use what they learn, "Intellectual Property:, to protect their intellectual work.

description.zh: 勞動法包括與勞動市場、個別勞動關係及集體勞動關係等方面有關勞工工作權益的法律規範，透過本課程可以學習正確的勞動法律觀念和知識，同時培養縝密思辨的能力，將課堂上所習得的知識應用落實在日常生活中，來保障並維護自己或他人的職場權益。
description.en: The legal specialty called Labor Law can be define as “the legal regulation of the labor market , individual labor relations and collective employer-employee relations. “labor market” pertains to market in which employers and workers exchange labor . Through this course , students can not only get correct concepts of " Labor Law " , but learn to protect their / others' rights in work place.

description.zh: 人際關係是探討對自我的了解及對人的認知，包括性格、態度、魅力、溝通、壓力、挫折和情緒等重要課題的處理；幫助同學學習與各種不同品味、信念、立場與生活方式的人作有效率的溝通，開放的表達出自己的感覺與想法，以建立良好的合作關係，從而開發潛能、爭取更好的發展機會。
description.en: Interpersonal Relationship is to discuss about self-understanding and perception of other people, including how to handle key issues related to character, attitude, attractiveness, communication, pressure, frustration and emotion.  It helps students to learn effective communication, open their minds to express personal feeling and thought, and try to communicate with other people having different tastes, convictions, standpoints and ways of living so as to establish a harmonic and cooperative relationship and furtherly to develop personal potential and strive for better opportunity of development.

description.zh: 此門課程主要在於瞭解社會學的意涵，並藉由跨領域的學習，讓不同學科能有對話的空間。課程涵蓋的範圍會兼顧理論與實用性，讓學生能思考當今的社會，理解到產生因素的多元性，並進而使個人眼界能更加開拓。期望學生於課程學習中能夠擁有更多對於整個社會的不同思維，以強化本身學科之所需，不但具有理論性深入的洞察力，也能引用到管理上實質的層面。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to understand sociology. It covers theory and practicability, and make students consider the current society, and understand the generated factors of diversity . Expect students' study can have more for the community as a whole different way of thinking, in order to strengthen their academic needs, not only has the theoretical depth of insight, but also on the substance applied to the management level.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹中華民國憲法、探討憲政體制的運作、人民權利義務的規範及相關法律的適用等問題。期能使學生認知國家民主法治的實施狀況，維護社會秩序與個人基本權利，進而體現人性尊嚴的價值。
description.en: This course focuses the discussions on the Constitution of the Republic of China,constitutional mechanism, the rights and obligations for the people and legitimate operations of the society. It is our hope that the students may have a better understanding on how the democracy is performed in our country as well as on how to preserve social security and basic human rights of the individuals-with the realization of human dignity as our extreme goal.

description.zh: 新經濟與舊經濟的分野不是在有『e』還是沒有『e』，而是在有『i』還是沒有『i』，而『i』就是『Innovation，創新』。二十一世紀的『腦力經濟』最重要的戲規則就是『智慧財產權』，同時也是WTO會員國必須遵守的重要規範之一。課程內容主要包括三個最基本的智慧財產權課題：專利權，商標權，以及著作權；而為配合本校學生學科背景，本課程將較著重於『專利』方面的實務知識，並且講授『如何激發創意，以培養學生日後能好好應用『智慧財產權』的保護。
description.en: The difference between New-economy and Old-economy is not caused by having "e" or not having "e", but caused by owining "i" or not owning "i". where "I" means "Innovation:.  Intellectual Property is not only the most importance business rule of the :Brain economy era:, but also one of the most important agreements among WTO members.  This course includes the basic three subjects of Intellectual Property:Patent, Trademark, and Copyright.  In order to accommodate the learning background for most of NTUT students, the contents of this course will focus more on the practical practice of the Patennt.  In addition, it also includes the subject of "how to activate your creativeness:so as to make students can use what they learn, "Intellectual Property:, to protect their intellectual work.

description.zh:
法學概論，顧名思義是在介紹法律原理，以啟發學生法學研究的興趣。然而，法學涵蓋的層面甚廣，法學緒論的課程，只能大略介紹各種法律的共通原理，就繁駁的法律現象，作綜合的引說，俾使初學法律的人，不僅能粗知「實定法」的共通原則，還可藉此原則來培養法律見解和修養，執簡馭繁，因而體會法律的性質、內涵和理念。
有關本課程的教授方式，擬先介紹法律的基概念及原理，並以答問之方式訓練學生邏輯反思的能力，同時輔以日常屢見之法律實例問題。如此，學生不僅可以可以學習正確的法律觀念和知識，並可培養縝密思辨的能力，將課堂上所習得的知識應用落實在日常生活中，以達保障並維護自己及他人權益之目的。
description.en: Introduction of Law is to introduce the theory of law and to promote students' interest to study law. Since the field of law is very broad but the time is limited, this course can briefly explain common principles of law, complex phenomena of law, etc. The main purpose of this course is to let students catch the concept of common principles of "lex scripta."  Also, this course aims to promote students' knowledge about law, thus cultivating their spirit of abiding by law.  This course will introduce the basic concept and theory of law first. Then students will be given logical training through discussion.  Besides, the general cases and problems of law will be covered as well. Through this course, students can not only get correct concepts of law, but learn to protect their/others' right.

description.zh: 「生活美學」是現代人依據東西方文化及各方美學的定義所推論出來的名詞，指應用於「生活」中食、衣、住、行、育、樂所體現美的內容及活動。依循相異的生活型態、社會環境，人類試圖重構生活藝術化與藝術生活化的當代美學。
description.en: “Aesthetics of living " will address the East-West cultural and aesthetic experience through series of questions that drive the discourse in contemporary life’s content and activities. Following the different lifestyles, social environment, human tries to reconstruct everyday life into contemporary aesthetics of living. This course aims to encourage students to think what is aesthetic of living, through the real life and spiritual life and concerned itself with the aesthetic problems in the lives of others.

description.zh:
因是在大專教藝術欣賞的課程，我在設計課程上，即考慮雖同學們不是藝術本科學生，但秉持"雖創作，但會欣賞的原則"，我的課程安排將從上古時代人類的美術創作活動進而引導解釋什麼是人類的美感經驗。讓他們明瞭東方藝術之同與不同，再介紹東西方的繪畫潮流，如西方：從文藝復興至寫實主義，印象主義，至超印象主義，東方：從漢的畫象磚開始至中國畫，書法之演進，中西繪畫之比較，內容是繁而多的。但我將用簡潔扼要的"重點教學法",寓教於樂的方式，讓同學不再懼怕"Art'，甚至可以簡單的分辨出藝術品的年代，作者，及欣賞藝術作品的要領，這是我給此門課所訂的目標。
另一個教學重點是："理論和實際併重"。在每一單元中，我將設計一項簡的[自己動手做]大概祇花 20-30 分鐘讓學生體會和真正看見，明白，藝術家製造藝術品的過程。
很希望能帶學生至博物院或美術館一趟，或至鶯砍參觀陶工廠。總之，一切課程計劃，乃配合學生之程度與興趣。
description.en: Because most students taking this course are not art major; therefore, I adhere to the principle of "Although not creation, appreciation will be instructed."  On course design, my class starts from the artistic creation of human beings in prehistoric time and further introduces the experience of beauty sensed by man and understand the similiar and difference of eastern and western art.  Moreover, I will introduce the fashion of priniting of eastern and western culture.  For example, the western culture: from the Renaissance to realism, impressionism and super impressionism.  Western culture: from a portrait stone of Han Dynasty to Chinese painting, the develpment of calligraphy and comparison of Chinese and western paintings. The teaching content is complicated, but I will simply it and highlight teaching way to let my students enjoy it.

description.zh: 本課程以培養學生尊重與欣賞不同族群、不同時空、不同價值觀所產生的音樂而設。藉由對音樂元素、本質的認知及介紹，欣賞各時期作曲家之代表作品，培養西方音樂的基本常識，建立音樂欣賞的專業態度。教學目標：1.提高學生音樂欣賞的素養，充實其音樂生活的內涵，2.激發學生對音樂的興趣，培育愛樂人口，增進社會祥和的原動力，3.介紹古今中外音樂名家名作，啟發學生對音樂創作的認知與敬重，4.建立學生對古典音樂、民族音樂、應用音樂及通俗音樂等不同類型音樂的正確認知與包容力，培養世界性的音樂觀。授課內容：1.概論, 2.歌樂, 3.器樂, 4.儀式音樂, 5.舞蹈音樂, 6.戲劇音樂。
description.en: This course aims to cultivate students' ability to appreciate music of different ethnic groups, different time and place, different value systems. Through the introduction of basic music elements as well as the appreciation of the masterpieces of various composers, it is hoped that students will build up basic music knowledge about music and enhance professional music appreciation potentiality in music. The goals include: 1. Elevating students' capability in music appreciation 2. Inspiring students' interest in music with a view to improving our society into a harmonious world. 3. Introducing domestic and international famous composers' pieces 4. Touring of various forms of music: classical, ethnic, applied and popular music. Contents of this course include: 1.Introduction 2. Vocal music 3. Instrumental music 4. Ritual music 5. Dance music 6. Theatre music

description.zh: 人類從尚未有文字的歷史以來，就有各種不同規模的戰爭，戰爭很吊詭的以你死或我亡，相互毀滅之態勢，爭奪「活著」的條件。古今中外，爆發戰爭的因素或為爭奪領土、權位、或為族群之戰、為意識形態之戰、或為物質資源之爭奪。在視覺影像發達的今日社會，有關戰爭的歷史影像的紀錄片與劇情片數量龐大、並有許多可觀之處。本課程將利用這些描寫戰爭影像資料，帶領同學瞭解相關戰爭與戰役爆發的歷史及其經過。
description.en: Throughout human history, even prior to written record, various types of warfare and scales of battles have existed for various purposes of domination or survival by all means of cruelty and destruction. The arousal of violent conflicts might be an attempt at fighting for territorial dominion or material resources economically or altering another species ideologically. In today's modern societies, bountiful documentaries and films concerning historical warfare have been accumulated. This course will aim at giving students a broad understanding and profound knowledge of the causes, process, and effects of significant warfare in human history with the aid of visual images in different media.

description.zh: 音樂概論以透過此課程讓學生對音樂有總體認識，了解音樂的元素、技術理論及文化背景，同時在探索音樂美感構成上的標準，我們可以從探索不同歷史時期的人文思想背景，了解對於當時音樂創作理念與風格發展的影響，以及音樂審美觀念的發展演變之影響，立基於探索音樂的發展方向、藝術本質及審美意涵，對音樂藝術概念及美學思想之延伸探討。
description.en: Through this course—Introduction to Music, students would have a general understanding of music, understand the elements of music, technical theory and cultural background, at the same time in the music aesthetic to explore the composition of the standard, through exploring the different historical periods of humanistic background, to understand for the time that the idea of music composing and the impact of musical style development, as well as the development of music aesthetic concept of the evolution of the impact, based on discussing the development of music, the essence of art, and aesthetic meaning, to develop the concept of musical art, as well as a probe into the extension of aesthetic thought.

description.zh: 介紹各種車輛使用先進駕駛輔助系統(Advanced Driver Assistance Systems, ADAS)、自駕車及車聯網設備的感測器及其應用。自駕車及車聯網亦需要多種感測器之支援，皆需要對應的感測器系統。同時也介紹先進工業儀器設備的感測器及其連結網路，包含運動控制相關感測器、視覺相關感測器、力量相關感測器與製程監控相關感測器四大主軸。
description.en: This course introduces the sensors used in Advanced Driver Assistance System (ADAS), autonomous vehicle and car-interconnected devices. These systems need the corresponding sensors in the real implementation. The sensors used in the industrial instruments, for motion, vision, force detection and process monitor, are also included in this course.

notes: 車輛三、四和機械三合開,限40人

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹大數據技術在金融方面的應用，課程內容包括資料準備、大數據分法、金融決策介紹、大數據在金融的應用、金融資料介紹、金融大數據分法、金融大數據專題實作。
description.en: This course is to introduce the use of big data techniques on financial applications. The course will cover data preparation, big data methods, introduction to financial decision, big data applications on finance, financial data preparation, financial big data methods, project implementation on financial big data.

notes: 資財四甲、乙和資財所合開

name.zh: 創業講座—創業是一場馬拉松
name.en: Entrepreneurship Lectures- The persistance that makes the great entrepreneur

description.zh: 隨著科技的發展與產值快速成長，網路、電商、商業新模式等各式創業大行其道，成為許多創業者的新選擇，本課程邀請國內知名創業楷模或創業成功典範之企業經理人分享創業成功之經驗。以真實具體的創業經驗為教材，讓學生更深刻體驗創業家之精神。希冀以觀摩學習典範企業的具體經驗，帶領學生學習企業創新與創業的思維，進而激發學生追求成就的渴望，強化青年學子對人生願景的規劃。
description.en: Along with the prosperous development of Internet, the output value of E-commerce is growing fast. Launching a business on the internet has become a new choice for many entrepreneurs. We invite the domestic business manager, as the model of outstanding and successful enterprise, to share his experiences of achievement with students. By offering the real and specific examples, business manager will make students learn further about the enterprisers' entrepreneurship. Through their experiences, we hope students can learn innovations and creations of enterprise; furthermore, students can be inspired to pursue their ambition to strengthen their wills to plan the future.

name.en: Science Technology Innovation And Foresight Thinking

description.zh: 本課程經由邀請產官學界專家蒞校進行講座課程演講及論壇之方式，進行創意與創新思維之實例教學，使學生能儘早瞭解企業創新之模式及相關理論，以啟發學生之創意，促進學術與產業之互動與交流，縮短產學距離。
description.en:
This course conducts the instances teaching of creativity and innovate thinking by invite industry, government and academic experts to give lectures and forums. The mine objective is to enable students to understand about the innovation model and
related theories of enterprises as soon as possible, and to inspire students’ creativity. Furthermore, promote interaction between academic and industry; and to shorten the distance between academic and industry.

description.zh:
隨著高齡化社會的來臨與國家對於身心障礙者生活福祉的重視，輔助科技相關資源與人才需求日益倍增，各類輔具產品使用已成為這些族群在醫療照護上與生活品質提升上不可或缺的一環。本門課程為「生醫輔助科技跨域微學程」之入門基礎課程，建立學生對輔助科技有基本的通盤認識，期許未來具備相關能力投入輔助創新產品研發。若未來有志投入輔助科技相關產業工作，建議微學程可由此門課程開始選修。
由於輔助科技涵蓋醫學與工程相關領域專業知識技術的整合，故由本校與臺北醫學大學攜手合作，兩校多位教師一同共授，提供兩校各20位學生選修，以促進學生或教師間的交流合作，本課程上課地點除了在本校，將有部分週次於北醫校園上課。
description.en: With the advent of aging society and the country's emphasis on the well-being of people with physical and mental disabilities, the demand of assistive technology resources and manpower is getting increased. The use of various assistive products has become an indispensable part for these people in medical care and quality of life. Assistive technology covers and integrates expertise in medicine and engineering related fields. The aims of this course are to let students have the comprehensive understanding of the current status and future trends of assistive technology. This course is the basic course for the “Assistive Technology Interdisciplinary Program”. If students consider to involve assistive technology-related industries in the future, we encourage students to enroll this course.

notes: 前9週至北醫上課，後9週北科上課，限25人，大研合開

name.en: Human Rights Images and Social Action

description.zh: 本課程將透過人權相關之影像文本賞析，以深耕人權觀念、培養學生公民素養，以及促進不同性別與族群間相互尊重、包容與關懷為主旨。每學期會安排兩至三個不同面向的人權教育單元，促進學生之間的交流與討論，提升對於人權議題的敏感度，並啟發對於推動人權之社會行動的想像與創意。
description.en:
This course is aimed at leading students to understand human rights concepts, cultivating citizen cultural literacy, and promoting mutual respect, tolerance and care among different genders and ethnic groups by reading a variety of visual materials. Two to three different themes of human rights education are introduced each semester.
It is expected that this course can increasing students’ sensitivity to human rights issues and inspiring their creativity on social actions of promoting human rights.

description.zh: 邀聘專家開設就業模擬課程模組，演繹各行業職人百態，以職場實例進行雙向互動，讓同學增進肢體及口語表達能力，並建立正確的工作態度和職場EQ。
description.en: Outstanding industrial professional is invited to organize the career simulation program, where scenarios are designed for students to tackle the issues that are possibly faced in the future career. Proper attitude and interpersonal skills at work and be built up through the diversity of themes and scenarios, such as team building, communication and collaboration, and leadership enhancing. The body language and the communicative skills of the students are also strengthened through the programs.

notes: 限大三以上學生，產業接軌課程

name.en: Development of global perspective: Korean I

description.zh: 本課程將教導學生韓文字母結構、發音方法及基礎詞彙、文法與句型、韓國現況及文化等，透過文化與語言的習得，培養學生與韓籍人士溝通或在韓國生活所需要的最基本的溝通能力。
description.en: This course aims to introduce beginners to basic spoken and written skills in Korean. Students will develop basic skills with a focus on effective communication and enjoyment through listening, speaking, reading and writing. By the end of the course, students will be able to hold a simple conversation in Korean, comprehend basic Korean texts and write about their everyday lives.

name.en: Development of global perspective:  Korean II

description.zh: 本課程將教導學生韓文字母結構、發音方法及基礎詞彙、文法與句型、韓國現況及文化等，透過文化與語言的習得，培養學生與韓籍人士溝通或在韓國生活所需要的最基本的溝通能力。
description.en: This course aims to introduce beginners to basic spoken and written skills in Korean. Students will develop basic skills with a focus on effective communication and enjoyment through listening, speaking, reading and writing. By the end of the course, students will be able to hold a simple conversation in Korean, comprehend basic Korean texts and write about their everyday lives.

name.en: Feast for the global perspective: French Ⅰ

description.zh: 本課程為基礎法文, 主要是幫助學生學習從字彙, 文法, 到日常會話的法文能力。
description.en: This class introduces basic French vocabulary, grammar, and conversation to the students.

name.en: Feast for the global perspective: German Ⅰ

description.zh: 本課程使學生具有基礎德語能力，並加強會話及閱讀能力訓練。
description.en: The focus of this course is to enable students to have basic German abilities and to strengthen the training or drilling of conversation and reading comprehension of the German language.

description.zh: 本課程使學生具有進階德語能力，並加強會話及閱讀能力訓練。
description.en: The focus of this course is to enable students to have intermediate German abilities and to strengthen the training or drilling of conversation and reading comprehension of the German language.

notes: 修課者需先行線上檢測，網址詳教學大綱

name.zh: 國際觀培養:馬來文化與語言
name.en: Emerging Market Series: Getting to know Malaysia

description.zh: 課程藉由傳授馬來西亞語言以協助學生拓展東南亞的就業版圖，旨在培養學生的馬來西亞語基本溝通能力，運用馬來語與當地母語者打招呼、了解馬來文化、建立人際關係、購物、敘述事物等，以此來協助學生前往馬來西亞就業，作為兩國的經濟橋樑。
description.en: In order to embrace economic development of globalization, especially in Asian and Southeast Asian countries, there is a need to introduce and equip our students not only with the basic local language but also to understand the local culture so as to strengthen the economic tie between Taiwan and the Asian countries and to enhance the employment opportunities of our students in these Asian countries. This course aims to help students to understand and develop basic communication skills by utilizing Bahasa Malaysia (Malaysian language) to communicate with Malaysian in terms of greeting, business contact establishment, interpersonal communication, etc. Historical and geographical backgrounds of Malaysia and their local cultures will also be introduced.

name.zh: 國際觀培養:印尼文化與語言
name.en: Development of global perspective:Indonesian culture and language

description.zh: 為了迎接全球化的亞洲國家與東南亞國家之間的經濟發展,藉由傳授印尼語言,讓學生掌握印尼語同時也了解印尼文化作為兩國的經濟橋樑，以此來協助學生前往印尼就業。本課程是培養學生的溝通能力，以運用印尼語來跟印尼母語者打招呼、建立人際關係、購物、敘述事物…等。
description.en: In order to embrace economic development of globalization, especially in Asian and Southeast Asian countries, there is a need to teach Indonesian (Bahasa Indonesia) and equip students not only with the language but also to understand the culture as an economic bridge between the two countries. And, it is hoped that assisting students in employment in Indonesia. This course will aim to help students to develop communication skills by utilizing Indonesian language to speak to native speakers in terms of greeting, business contact establishment, interpersonal communication, and descriptive usage…etc.

name.zh: 國際觀培養:泰國文化與語言(一)
name.en: Development of global perspective: Thai culture and language I

description.zh: 1. 在臺灣與東南亞交流日益增加的情況下，東南亞語言的學習需求也會隨之提高。而「泰國」所擁有的社會經濟條件優勢，以及泰國政府有意推動的文化創意產業，相信也將為臺灣帶來一陣「泰語學習風潮」。 2. 課程以培養基礎泰語溝通能力、激發學習泰語興趣，以及跨文化理解為宗旨。課程架構包括泰國語言教學及元化議題討論，使其在具備泰語溝通基本實力之外，更能對泰國各方面情勢與文化、思想、禮節、風俗習慣、宗教禁忌等，都具有深度認識。 3. 泰語教學方面，秉持聽、說、讀、寫同時並進的教學理念，由字母的發音、寫法、唸法、聲調、順序及拼字系統的學習開始，奠定良好的泰語基礎，搭配最常用的單字、句型、文法與日常實用會話，使學生可以拼寫、閱讀泰文短文，並能以泰語進行日常對話。 4. 泰國文化方面，以專題的方式，講述政治、經濟、社會、地理、歷史與文化等各個層面的泰國，呈現出不同於一般刻板印象中的泰國，培養學生對泰國的正確認識及態度。本學期先針對泰國目前的經濟與文化面進行概說；下學期則探討泰國歷史、地理、政治與社會。
description.en: 1. With the interaction between Taiwan and Southeast Asia getting more and more frequent, the need for learning Southeast Asian languages has been highly increasing. Thailand owns the advantages of social economy; moreover, Thailand government intends to promote cultural creativity industries. Hence, learning Thai definitely becomes a new trend in Taiwan. 2. This course aims to help students build the foundation of speaking basic Thai, and arouse students’ interests in learning Thai. Also, it helps students get to know cross-cultural differences. In addition to learning Thai, students have to discuss the issues related to Thai culture. Accordingly, students are not only able to make conversations, but have further understanding of Thai culture, thinking, manners, customs and religious taboos etc. 3. In terms of learning Thai, listening, speaking, reading and writing, these four skills are equally important. Student will be trained to learn all these four skills together. At first, s

name.zh: 國際觀培養:泰國文化與語言(二)
name.en: Development of global perspective: Thai culture and language II

description.zh: 課程以培養泰語溝通能力、激發學習泰語興趣，以及跨文化理解為宗旨。課程架構包括泰國語言教學及元化議題討論，使其在具備泰語溝通實力之外，更能對泰國各方面情勢與文化、思想、禮節、風俗習慣、宗教禁忌等，都具有深度認識。
description.en: This course aims to help students build the foundation of speaking Thai, and arouse students’ interests in learning Thai. Also, it helps students get to know cross-cultural differences. In addition to learning Thai, students have to discuss the issues related to Thai culture. Accordingly, students are not only able to make conversations, but have further understanding of Thai culture, thinking, manners, customs and religious taboos etc.

name.zh: 國際觀培養:越南文化與語言(一)
name.en: Development of global perspective: Vietnam culture and language I

description.zh: 在全球金融海嘯後，已開發國家經濟成長趨緩，新興亞洲國家-東協國家經濟成長迅速，本課程將以越南語教學為主，越南經貿、觀光文化及越語字母拼音教學，讓學生在學習越語的同時，深入了解越南文化，協助學生拓展東南亞的就業版圖。
description.en: This series of courses aim to provide students with opportunities to understand emerging markets in a global context. Global economy in the post-recession world relies heavily on emerging economies, in particular countries in Southeast Asia known as ASEAN. Seeing the greater potential for economic gains and development, we build up the courses from introducing the fundamentals, including but not limited to, their economy, culture, tourism and people with special emphasis on the use of the language for communication along with its relevance to Taiwan as a trading partner.

name.zh: 國際觀培養:日語與文化(二)
name.en: Development of global perspective: Japanese Ⅱ

description.zh: 本課程為日語與文化(一)之進階課程，提供學生養成進階日語聽說讀寫技能，並能夠面對在各種情境下，表達出適當的日語，足以應付日常生活簡單狀況。此外，並運用多媒體等工具，介紹日本文化，歷史，人文等多種面向，讓學生能更多元地了解日本，有效提升學習興趣及效率。
description.en: This course is designed for students who has basic Japanese knowledge or who passed the language course: Japanese (I) in the previous term. This course provides a comprehensive approach to developing the four basic language skills (listening, speaking, reading, and writing) in order to cultivate your overall Japanese language ability to a level sufficient for various occasions and everyday life. In addition, using multimedia to introduce a variety of Japanese culture, history , and humanities. The students can learn more about Japan in many different perspectives, and effectively enhance interest in the learning process.

name.zh: 國際觀培養:日語與文化(一)

description.zh: 本課程提供學生養成基本日語聽說讀寫技能，並能夠面對在各種情境下，表達出適當的日語，足以應付日常生活簡單狀況。此外，並運用多媒體等工具，介紹日本文化，歷史，人文等多種面向，讓學生能更多元地了解日本，有效提升學習興趣及效率。
description.en: This course provides a comprehensive approach to developing the four basic language skills (listening, speaking, reading, and writing) in order to cultivate your overall Japanese language ability to a level sufficient for various occasions and everyday life.In addition , using multimedia to introduce a variety of Japanese culture, history , and humanities. The students can learn more about Japan in many different perspectives, and effectively enhance interest in the learning process.

name.zh: 國際觀培養:基礎西班牙語1(A1上)

description.zh: 本課程專為初學西班牙文之學生設計，毋需任何西班牙文基礎。本課程著重在學習西班牙文發音及了解基礎文法架構。課程結束前，學生將可以閱讀基本的西班牙文文句、自我介紹及西班牙文的基礎對話。
description.en: This is course is designed for first time students of Spanish. No previous knowledge is required to enroll this course. The focus of this course is to provide a basic knowledge of the pronunciation and grammatical structures of Spanish at the beginner level. By the end of this course, the student will be able to read basic texts in Spanish, self-introduce himself and start a basic conversation.

name.zh: 國際觀培養:基礎西班牙語2(A1下)

description.zh: 本課程專為初學西班牙文之學生設計，毋需任何西班牙文基礎。本課程著重在學習西班牙文發音及了解基礎文法架構。課程結束前，學生將可以閱讀基本的西班牙文文句、自我介紹及西班牙文的基礎對話。
description.en: This is course is designed for first time students of Spanish. No previous knowledge is required to enroll this course. The focus of this course is to provide a basic knowledge of the pronunciation and grammatical structures of Spanish at the beginner level. By the end of this course, the student will be able to read basic texts in Spanish, self-introduce himself and start a basic conversation.

description.zh: 本課程目的在於培養學生學術寫作與表達技巧及跨領域學習的能力。閱讀各領域學術論文，有效掌握學術文章閱讀技巧；透過學術論文寫作架構，學習學術英文句型與用字。
description.en: This course aims to develop students’ academic writing skills and cultivate the potential for cross-disciplinary learning. By reading academic articles in various fields, students not only can effectively master the reading skills needed to efficiently read academic articles but also acquire essential sentence patterns, and vocabulary for academic writing.

name.en: The Language of Professional English Presentation

description.zh: 本課程目的在於培養學生語言表達技巧及跨領域整合能力。藉由觀摩講者的演說，有效掌握英語演說技巧，同時搭配主題導向字彙與句型練習，培養英語簡報技巧，加強口語表達能力。
description.en:
When we are at work or participate in academic conferences, an effective presentation could highly facilitate interpersonal communication. This course aims to guide students to be confident in delivering English oral presentation. In
this class, you will not only learn the core concepts of presentation skills but
have many opportunities to do theme-based oral exercises and give short talks.

name.en: English Job Interview Tips and Tricks

description.zh: 本課程目的在於培養學生學習如何在面試時，能夠運用正確的文法結構及精準的字彙和片語和面試官交談，並且能夠透過學習一些簡單地演說技巧，讓學生在面試的過程中，利用真誠的眼神接觸和適當地肢體動作來增添自己說話時的自信。
description.en: This course aims to develop students’ speaking competence in the job interview. By watching TED Talks, students are able to acquire what a successful speaker should do to build up confidence. In addition, students are required to set up a target for the preparation of a mock interview. Through the improvement of each one-on-one interview, students are expected to use more precise words or accurate grammar with adequate eye contact and gestures.

name.zh: 跟著英文去旅行：背包客英文

description.zh:
本課程以旅行的始末作為課程的骨幹，學生在課程當中會學到：
1.背包客旅行與團體旅行的差異以及作為一位背包客可能會面臨的挑戰
2.如何自己規劃調整行程(目的地、假期天數、參考資料)
3.如何選擇交通工具(機票火車票如何預定)
4.如何決定住宿問題
5.如何臨危不亂地化解各種危機
6.如何為自己在旅程中留下回憶與紀錄
description.en:
The course structure is arranged from the beginning to the end of the journey. Students will learn the following from this course:
1. The differences between backpackers and group trips and a backpacker’s challenge. 
2. How to organize your itinerary (destination, holiday period and reference)
3. How to choose your means of transport (booking flight or train tickets)
4. How to choose your accommodation (hotels/hostels/B&B)
5. How to cope with a crisis during the journey
6. How to preserve your trip memories

name.en: TOEFL Listening & Reading Tips and Practice

description.zh: 本課主旨在針對托福聽讀測驗設計課程，提供練習，俾使學生嫻熟各式的托福聽讀測驗，希冀能夠藉由本課程的修習，提升學生不斷的學習外國語的興致，並且，藉由通過考試取得證照，增加未來職場的競爭力。
description.en: This course is designed to familiarize the students with the TOEFL Listening & Reading test by providing some tips and practice. We hope that the students who finish taking the course will go on with their enthusiasm for studying foreign languages; besides, through the acquisition of the certificate when the students pass the tests, they are sure to enhance their capability in the increasingly competitive job markets.

description.zh: 本課主旨在針對托福寫作測驗設計課程，提供練習，俾使學生嫻熟各式的托福寫作測驗，希冀能夠藉由本課程的修習，提升學生不斷的學習外國語的興致，並且，藉由通過考試取得證照，增加未來職場的競爭力。
description.en: This course is designed to familiarize the students with the TOEFL Writing test by providing some tips and practice. We hope that the students who finish taking the course will go on with their enthusiasm for studying foreign languages; besides, through the acquisition of the certificate when the students pass the tests, they are sure to enhance their capability in the increasingly competitive job markets.

description.zh: 本課主旨在針對托福口說測驗設計課程，提供練習，俾使學生嫻熟各式的托福口說測驗，希冀能夠藉由本課程的修習，提升學生不斷的學習外國語的興致，並且，藉由通過考試取得證照，增加未來職場的競爭力。
description.en: This course is designed to familiarize the students with the TOEFL Speaking test. We hope that the students who finish taking the course will go on with their enthusiasm for studying foreign languages; besides, through the acquisition of the certificate when the students pass the tests, they are sure to enhance their capability in the increasingly competitive job markets.

description.zh: 本課程目的在於培養學生創業的知識，並透過不同的企業具體經驗，帶領學生學習企業之創業的思維。當學生有了相關創業知識與思維後，以專業英文之角度讓學生認識簡報應有之流程與架構，並提升學生及工作所需要之英文簡報能力。培育學生為全球化移動以及英語專業溝通人才，進而以適應全球化生活與培養終身競爭力。
description.en: This course aims to learn entrepreneurship through different models of outstanding and successful enterprise. In addition, this course makes students enhance their English presentation skills for current academic and future career pursuits via the perspectives of ESP. By this course, as the crux of a highly-integrated work of domain knowledge and the English learning development embodies the indispensable credentials requires for a global profession and makes students learn further about the world, and inspires students to strengthen their independent thinking and global perspective.

name.zh: 國際觀培養:越南文化與語言(二)
name.en: Development of global perspective: Vietnam culture and language II

description.zh: 在全球金融海嘯後，已開發國家經濟成長趨緩，新興亞洲國家-東協國家經濟成長迅速，本課程將以越南語教學為主，越南經貿、觀光文化及越語字母拼音教學，讓學生在學習越語的同時，深入了解越南文化，協助學生拓展東南亞的就業版圖。
description.en: This series of courses aim to provide students with opportunities to understand emerging markets in a global context. Global economy in the post-recession world relies heavily on emerging economies, in particular countries in Southeast Asia known as ASEAN. Seeing the greater potential for economic gains and development, we build up the courses from introducing the fundamentals, including but not limited to, their economy, culture, tourism and people with special emphasis on the use of the language for communication along with its relevance to Taiwan as a trading partner.

description.zh: 本課程藉由邀請校內外之社會、政治、經濟、文化等專家學者與莘莘學子們進行相互交流，透過「全球議題」、「文化學習」等主題之進階探討，培養學生世界公民之意識，重新定位自己，以適應全球化生活與培養終身競爭力。
description.en: We invite the domestic speakers, as the outstanding scholars of cross-cultural communication, to share their knowledge and experiences with students. By exploring the global issues such as social, cultural, political or economic studies, the course makes students learn further about the world, and inspires students to strengthen their independent thinking and global perspective.

description.zh:
本次更利用業界常用之光學模擬軟體RSoft以及COMSOL進行光學元件與系統設計，主要探討近代光學之應用，如光通訊，光敏材料和奈米光學結構等主題進行設計與討論。
課程最後使用專題來檢驗學生學習成果，可探討題目有一維光子晶體：薄膜干涉、抗反射膜設計，二維/三維光子晶體，微結構之穿透反射頻譜、能隙分布（BandGap）計算，Meta-materials：微結構天線、光學抗反射結構（隱形斗篷），基礎波動光學：雙狹縫干涉、單狹縫繞射、散射（Rayleigh Scattering、Mie Scattering）等。
description.en:
The used tool for this class is RSoft and COMSOL, common-used optical simulation software in industries. 
Students should present their work through final project presentations to examine their learning outcomes. The topics for final project include one-dimensional photonic crystals: thin film interference, anti-reflection film design, 2D/3D photonic crystals, transmission spectrum of microstructure, Bandgap calculation , Meta-materials: Micro-structured antennas, optical anti-refl

name.en: Feast for the global perspective: French II

description.zh: 本課程為法文一的進階課程，將持續就字母結構、發音方法及基礎詞彙、文法與句型、法國現況及文化等，透過文化與語言的習得，培養學生與法語系人士溝通或在法國生活所需要的最基本的溝通能力。
description.en: This course aims to introduce beginners to basic spoken and written skills in French. Students will develop basic skills with a focus on effective communication and enjoyment through listening, speaking, reading and writing. By the end of the course, students will be able to hold a simple conversation in French, comprehend basic French texts and write about their everyday lives.

name.en: Socializing Spoken English Skill for Workplace

description.zh: 提升學生職場與外國人互動時，除了練習英語聽力及口說能力，並融入文化理解、熟悉日常工作中英語核心字彙及句型並加以訓練，讓學生日後得以實際應用在職場之中。
description.en: This course is helping student to improve their English speaking skill for workplace. This will include things such as structure, organization and delivery, common functions, and interactive communication.

notes: 9/17起，四AB節上課，第一週施測，共10次

description.zh: 本課程從電化學概念，電極電位，及腐蝕原理中建立學生腐蝕技術，包括DC極化法，AC阻抗法，諧波法，ER測試，ERR敏化測試高溫水溶液，應力腐蝕測試等，另外腐蝕壽命評估，材料腐蝕管理系統，核能電廠材料，地下緊密電位量測，水溶液腐蝕抑制效果，鋼筋混泥土結構防蝕效果評估均在本課程中一一介紹。
description.en: 1.Electrochemical mechanisms 2.Corrosion tendency and Electrode Potentials 3.Polarization and Corrosion Rates 4.Theories of Passivity 5.Corrosion Prevention 6.Eight forms of Corrosion 7.High Temprature Corrosion

name.en: Elective  Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Culture

description.zh: 本課程旨在提昇學生的人文素養。透過文學概論、藝術概論與文化概論等相關課程，引導學生探索文學的妙趣，欣賞藝術的美質，瞭解文化的傳統。從古典到現代，從本土到世界，從物質到心靈，建構多元化的文化視野。以臺灣為出發點，搜尋未知的世界地圖，找到人們必然駐足的角落，以及自己不可缺席的人文風景。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to enrich the literary taste and the cultural cultivation of our students. Though the related course, like Introduction of Literature, Introduction of Art and Introduction of Culture, we hope to guide the students to explore the interest of the Literature, to enjoy the beauty of the Art and to understand the tradition of the Culture. From classic to modern, from local to universe, from material to spirit, we want to construct multiple cultural views. Taking Taiwan as a start, we would search the unknown map of the universe, and would find a corner for consequential staying and one's own liberal scenery.

notes: 北醫/人文向度/教師賴淑芳/3101教室

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一、二年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman and Sophomore students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in. Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

name.zh: 心腦，人工智慧與倫理哲學

class.name: 跨校選課(大)－臺北醫學大學
跨校選課(大)－臺北醫學大學

notes: 教師徐美玲,My2tmu平台,遠距教學(非同步),限1人

Though the related course, like Introduction of Literature, Introduction of Art and Introduction of Culture, we hope to guide the students to explore the interest of the Literature, to enjoy the beauty of the Art and to understand the tradition of the Culture. From classic to modern, from local to universe, from material to spirit, we want to construct multiple cultural views. Taking Taiwan as a start, we would search the unknown map of the universe, and would find a corner for consequential staying and one's own liberal scenery.

class.name: 跨校選課(大)－臺北醫學大學

notes: 教師趙振瑞,遠距教學(非同步),限5人

class.name: 跨校選課(大)－臺北醫學大學

class.name: 跨校選課(大)－臺北醫學大學

class.name: 跨校選課(大)－國立臺灣海洋大學

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為讓學生可以利用暑期或其它時間至學校認可之校外公私立機構進行或參與實習，以增進學生之實務能力。學生於學校認可之校外機構實習總累計時數不得低於320小時。學生實習期滿後，應依據各系規定繳交相關實習相關成果報告，彙交所屬系保存，並作為成績核定之依據。學生校外實習學期成績之評定比例原則：實習單位占50%，輔導老師占50%，各系得依其屬性調整之。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to elevate an all-round ability for the students at NTUT. During the summer break　or other periods of time, students are required to go to government-based organizations or industry/business-oriented agencies with respect to promoting practice of ability. The course takers will need to stay in the same individual organization or agency with an accumulated amount of time of no less than 320 hours. After the students complete the requirements in question, these organizations and agencies will offer them certificates -- or proof of any kind -- in accordance with the real performance on site. The grading principle will be equivalently decided by the thesis advisor (50%) and the on-site organization or agency (50%), respectively. The individual department or graduate institute may make proper adjustments according to the situations in need.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生利用暑假至機械相關機構實習（實習實際天數依「校外實習」實行辦法另訂之），參與校外合作機構所提供之訓練，觀摩學習專業工廠之實際運作。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核；學生必須撰寫實習心得報告，彙交系上保存。
description.en: The course is developed to increase students' capability of on-job practice. Participation in one of the corporative mechanical engineering company during summer vocation, practice and learn the real operation of the mechanical engineering related fields . A practice intern and a well-prepared report must be completed to the course requirement.

name.zh: 表演藝術─古典音樂表演
name.en: Elective  Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Culture

description.zh: 本課程旨在提昇學生的人文素養。透過文學概論、藝術概論與文化概論等相關課程，引導學生探索文學的妙趣，欣賞藝術的美質，瞭解文化的傳統。從古典到現代，從本土到世界，從物質到心靈，建構多元化的文化視野。以臺灣為出發點，搜尋未知的世界地圖，找到人們必然駐足的角落，以及自己不可缺席的人文風景。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to enrich the literary taste and the cultural cultivation of our students. Though the related course, like Introduction of Literature, Introduction of Art and Introduction of Culture, we hope to guide the students to explore the interest of the Literature, to enjoy the beauty of the Art and to understand the tradition of the Culture. From classic to modern, from local to universe, from material to spirit, we want to construct multiple cultural views. Taking Taiwan as a start, we would search the unknown map of the universe, and would find a corner for consequential staying and one's own liberal scenery.

notes: 北醫/人文向度/教師賴淑芳/3201教室

description.zh: 本課程旨在提昇學生的人文素養。透過文學概論、藝術概論與文化概論等相關課程，引導學生探索文學的妙趣，欣賞藝術的美質，瞭解文化的傳統。從古典到現代，從本土到世界，從物質到心靈，建構多元化的文化視野。以臺灣為出發點，搜尋未知的世界地圖，找到人們必然駐足的角落，以及自己不可缺席的人文風景。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to enrich the literary taste and the cultural cultivation of our students. Though the related course, like Introduction of Literature, Introduction of Art and Introduction of Culture, we hope to guide the students to explore the interest of the Literature, to enjoy the beauty of the Art and to understand the tradition of the Culture. From classic to modern, from local to universe, from material to spirit, we want to construct multiple cultural views. Taking Taiwan as a start, we would search the unknown map of the universe, and would find a corner for consequential staying and one's own liberal scenery.

name.zh: 海洋觀光旅遊實踐與規劃(人格)
name.en: Elective  Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Philosophy

description.zh: 哲學既是一門兼具理想性與現實性的基礎學科，又是一種既有趣又深刻的一種思想活動。 它所探討的目標都是和人類自身與他們所生活的周遭世界密切相關的一些基本問題；這些基本問題至少包括：宇宙、知識、公平正義、道德、宗教、語言、心靈、社會、教育、愛情，和生與死。 從事哲學思考，就是對上述問題，進行一種反省。 這種反省，能夠讓我們明白形成這些問題背後的一些基本原則，以及解決這些問題的一些可能方案的理由根據和獲致這些解決方案的應有程序。 由於哲學是著重思考與反省的活動，學習哲學其實不僅僅可以幫助我們掌握和人類自身與生活世界相關問題的一些根本知識，更能培養一個負責任的社會公民不可或缺的一種思維能力和反省態度。
description.en: Philosophy is not only a fundamental subject with both ideals and practical value, but also an interesting thinking activity of depth.  The topics it discusses concern some basic questions for we human beings and the world around us.  These basic questions at least include: the universe, knowledge, equality and justice, morality, religion, language, mind, society, education, love, and life and death.  Thinking things philosophically is to reflect upon these basic questions.  The reflection of this sort leads us to understand not only the basic principles behind these questions,   also the reasons and procedures of the possible solutions to these questions.  Given philosophy is such an activity based on thinking and reflection, learning philosophy hence can help us grasp the required knowledge concerning ourselves and our living world, and more importantly, prepare a thinking ability and reflecting attitude that are needed for us to succeed in becoming responsible social citizen.

notes: 海洋/人文向度/教師嚴佳代/BOH402教室

name.zh: 臺灣近代歷史人物與事件(歷史)

name.zh: 傳播技能-媒體聲音表達專題(美學
name.en: Elective  Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Philosophy

description.zh: 哲學既是一門兼具理想性與現實性的基礎學科，又是一種既有趣又深刻的一種思想活動。 它所探討的目標都是和人類自身與他們所生活的周遭世界密切相關的一些基本問題；這些基本問題至少包括：宇宙、知識、公平正義、道德、宗教、語言、心靈、社會、教育、愛情，和生與死。 從事哲學思考，就是對上述問題，進行一種反省。 這種反省，能夠讓我們明白形成這些問題背後的一些基本原則，以及解決這些問題的一些可能方案的理由根據和獲致這些解決方案的應有程序。 由於哲學是著重思考與反省的活動，學習哲學其實不僅僅可以幫助我們掌握和人類自身與生活世界相關問題的一些根本知識，更能培養一個負責任的社會公民不可或缺的一種思維能力和反省態度。
description.en: Philosophy is not only a fundamental subject with both ideals and practical value, but also an interesting thinking activity of depth.  The topics it discusses concern some basic questions for we human beings and the world around us.  These basic questions at least include: the universe, knowledge, equality and justice, morality, religion, language, mind, society, education, love, and life and death.  Thinking things philosophically is to reflect upon these basic questions.  The reflection of this sort leads us to understand not only the basic principles behind these questions,   also the reasons and procedures of the possible solutions to these questions.  Given philosophy is such an activity based on thinking and reflection, learning philosophy hence can help us grasp the required knowledge concerning ourselves and our living world, and more importantly, prepare a thinking ability and reflecting attitude that are needed for us to succeed in becoming responsible social citizen.

notes: 海洋/社法向度/教師許文宜/BOH403教室

description.zh: 哲學既是一門兼具理想性與現實性的基礎學科，又是一種既有趣又深刻的一種思想活動。 它所探討的目標都是和人類自身與他們所生活的周遭世界密切相關的一些基本問題；這些基本問題至少包括：宇宙、知識、公平正義、道德、宗教、語言、心靈、社會、教育、愛情，和生與死。 從事哲學思考，就是對上述問題，進行一種反省。 這種反省，能夠讓我們明白形成這些問題背後的一些基本原則，以及解決這些問題的一些可能方案的理由根據和獲致這些解決方案的應有程序。 由於哲學是著重思考與反省的活動，學習哲學其實不僅僅可以幫助我們掌握和人類自身與生活世界相關問題的一些根本知識，更能培養一個負責任的社會公民不可或缺的一種思維能力和反省態度。
description.en: Philosophy is not only a fundamental subject with both ideals and practical value, but also an interesting thinking activity of depth.  The topics it discusses concern some basic questions for we human beings and the world around us.  These basic questions at least include: the universe, knowledge, equality and justice, morality, religion, language, mind, society, education, love, and life and death.  Thinking things philosophically is to reflect upon these basic questions.  The reflection of this sort leads us to understand not only the basic principles behind these questions,   also the reasons and procedures of the possible solutions to these questions.  Given philosophy is such an activity based on thinking and reflection, learning philosophy hence can help us grasp the required knowledge concerning ourselves and our living world, and more importantly, prepare a thinking ability and reflecting attitude that are needed for us to succeed in becoming responsible social citizen.

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：History

description.zh: 本課程主要是讓學生對歷史這門學科有一通盤、系統的認識，以便讓學生瞭解歷史的思維取向，增加個人的歷史意識。並在歷史學門的領域中，提供數門基礎及進階課程，供同學選修，以期同學從課程的學習中，理解台灣、中國乃至世界文明的進程與發展，剖析歷史學與現實的互動，提昇學生批判思考之能力。
description.en: This course focuses on getting the students familiar with the academic field of history in a more comprehensive and systematic view. The students are stimulated to think and make judgment with a view to "knowing the history," adding to a better sense of history. Further, they are guided to select some  courses in the field of history, including the formation and changes of the of Taiwan China and the World-as well as interactions between history and the reality-thus enhancing their critical ability to think and judge.

notes: 北大/自然向度/教師陳湘繁/公1F11教室

description.zh: 本課程主要是讓學生對歷史這門學科有一通盤、系統的認識，以便讓學生瞭解歷史的思維取向，增加個人的歷史意識。並在歷史學門的領域中，提供數門基礎及進階課程，供同學選修，以期同學從課程的學習中，理解台灣、中國乃至世界文明的進程與發展，剖析歷史學與現實的互動，提昇學生批判思考之能力。
description.en: This course focuses on getting the students familiar with the academic field of history in a more comprehensive and systematic view. The students are stimulated to think and make judgment with a view to "knowing the history," adding to a better sense of history. Further, they are guided to select some  courses in the field of history, including the formation and changes of the of Taiwan China and the World-as well as interactions between history and the reality-thus enhancing their critical ability to think and judge.
